entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
